title: Looking for ppl to duo
body:
looking for silver players to duo with
i aint a star, but consider myself solid - good game knowledge
just looking for duo cos I'm sick of having 50% of my games filled with ppl who feed - yes baddies - is frustrating and tbh a waste of my time cos tbh it just makes the game not fun when another role in game feeds 4 kills early, and u get stomped as a result
all i want is to play even games, cos they are generally the most fun.

add affektz in game - play any role

replies.body:
add me bro. i feel your pain.
IGN: span
